Here's the **final drafted LinkedIn post** with all of your feedback incorporated.  

---

## **🔥 Final LinkedIn Post Draft**  

### **🚀 The Way We Evaluate Job Candidates Needs to Evolve—Fast**  
Experience, skills, and education are **no longer enough in the AI era.**  
The most important thing now? **How a candidate can use AI to become a force multiplier.**  

---

### **📌 The Problem: How We Evaluate Candidates Today**
For decades, hiring decisions have been based on:  
✅ **Experience** (How many years?)  
✅ **Skills** (Do they match a checklist?)  
✅ **Education** (What degree do they have?)  

But **AI has fundamentally changed how work gets done.**  
A candidate’s real value is **not just what they know, but how they can leverage AI to amplify their impact.**  

We’re still measuring job seekers like it’s 2015. That needs to change.  

---

### **⚡ The Experiment: Let’s Test a New Hiring Model**
Instead of just talking about it, **we’re testing it.**  

I’m building an **MVP version** of an AI-driven job application process that:  
✅ **Applies to jobs using a new AI-first qualification framework**  
✅ **Conducts outreach in a way that reflects AI implementation ability**  
✅ **Redefines how a job seeker showcases their value in an AI-first world**  

**We need a few real jobs to test this on**—with real people who do or know the work.  

---

### **💡 How You Can Participate**
🔹 **If you’re a hiring manager or recruiter** and have a job in areas like [INSERT EXPERTISE BULLETS], **drop it in the comments.**  
🔹 **If you’re in a similar role**, post your **current job description.**  
🔹 If we don’t get enough, **we’ll pick roles ourselves.**  

By Monday, we’ll have an **MVP version of this process running.**  

---

### **📊 Quick Update on the Last Post & Thank You**
🚀 **The last post drove X reposts and X impressions—huge thanks to everyone who engaged.**  
🔥 Your feedback and conversations helped shape this experiment.  
💡 We’re pushing forward **to make job searching AI-native.**  

One of the goals of this was to **connect with experts.**  
Through **AI-driven outreach, we were able to do that** and now have **several calls lined up, including one with a distinguished thought leader and entrepreneur in AI.**  

---

### **🐶 The Chewy Decision**
Not everything goes viral—and that’s okay. **Chewy didn’t, but it remains a viable long-term project.**  
We’re **strategizing organic growth through automation** and will **fully automate the content strategy over time.**  
For now, the focus is on **AI implementation first.**  

---

### **🚀 Join the Experiment**
💬 **Drop job descriptions in the comments.**  
📢 **Tag someone who might have a role that fits.**  
🔍 Let’s **test how AI can change hiring—starting now.**  

---
